articles.author: Alexis Benveniste, CNN Business
articles.title: Stelter: Fox News is more anti-Democrat than pro-Trump
articles.description: If you thought Fox News would dial down the highly charged rhetoric after Donald Trump left office, you'd be mistaken. It is not slowing down when it comes to bashing President Joe Biden.

articles.title: White House holding call with senators to drum up bipartisan support for Covid-19 relief package

articles.title: Jim Acosta: I've never seen Trump this alone
articles.description: Donald Trump spent his last moments as President sad and alone, according to Jim Acosta, who led CNN's coverage of Trump during his presidency.

articles.title: Fareed: 100 million vaccines in 100 days isn't enough
articles.description: Fareed gives his take on why President Biden should double his vaccination ambitions for his first 100 days in office.

articles.author: George Ramsay, CNN
articles.title: Mesut Ozil joins Fenerbahce from Arsenal as he vows to be a 'Gunner for life'
articles.description: The long-running saga between Mesut Ozil and Arsenal came to an end on Sunday as it was announced that the midfielder has joined Fenerbahce on a three-and-a-half-year deal.

articles.author: Douglas S. Wood, CNN
articles.title: Police break up 'illegal nightclub' in the basement of a Massachusetts home
articles.description: Police in a Massachusetts town broke up an "illegal night club" in a residential basement with a full bar and a waitress -- and the city is investigating possible Covid-19 restriction violations.

articles.title: Stelter: Biden-bashing has been turned up to 11 on right-wing tv
articles.description: President Joe Biden emphasized the need to bridge the political divide plaguing the country in his inaugural address. CNN's Brian Stelter argues that with divisive right-wing media, unity is a difficult goal.

articles.author: Clare Foran and Gregory Krieg, CNN
articles.title: Progressives hope for more power in narrowly divided Congress
articles.description: House progressives are poised to wield their growing influence in the new Congress as the Democratic Party settles in to unified control of Washington for the first time in a decade.

articles.title: Godiva is closing or selling all of its stores in the United States
articles.description: Luxury chocolatier Godiva is getting out of the brick and mortar business.

articles.title: Sanders says Democrats will use reconciliation 'as soon as we possibly can' to pass Covid-19 relief package
articles.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders, the incoming chairman of the Senate budget committee, told CNN's Dana Bash Democrats will use budget reconciliation "as soon as we possibly can" to pass a Covid-19 relief package by 51 votes in the Senate, rather than 60.

articles.title: Tyrrell Hatton wins Abu Dhabi Championship as Rory McIlroy fades on the final day
articles.description: Tyrrell Hatton claimed his sixth European Tour title at the Abu Dhabi Championship with a final round 66 on Sunday.
